author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Hwæt, we ealle witon      hwelce ærleste
text.1: ge neah ge feor      Neron worhte,
text.2: Romwara cyning,      þa his rice wæs
text.3: hehst under heofonum,      to hryre monegum.
text.4: Wælhreowes gewed      wæs ful wide cuð,
text.8: He het him to gamene      geara forbærnan
text.9: Romana burig,      sio his rices wæs
text.11: wolde fandian      gif þæt fyr meahte
text.12: lixan swa leohte      and swa longe eac,
text.14: secgan geherde      þæt on sume tide
text.17: hama under hefonum.      Næs þæt herlic dæd,
text.18: þæt hine swelces gamenes      gilpan lyste,
text.19: þa he ne earnade      elles wuhte,
text.20: buton þæt he wolde      ofer werðiode
text.22: Eac hit gesælde      æt sumum cierre
text.23: ðæt se ilca het      ealle acwellan
text.26: þe he on þæm folce      gefrigen hæfde,
text.28: and his modor mid      meca ecgum,
text.29: billum ofbeatan.      He his bryde ofslog
text.30: self mid sweorde,      and he symle wæs
text.36: ac he on ferðe fægn      facnes and searuwa
text.37: wælriow wunode.      Wiold emne swa þeah
text.39: swa swa lyft and lagu      land ymbclyppað,
text.42: oð ða norðmestan      næssan on eorðan;
text.43: eall þæt Nerone      nede oððe lustum,
text.45: He hæfde him to gamene,      þonne he on gylp astag,
text.46: hu he eorðcyningas      yrmde and cwelmde.
text.47: Wenst ðu þæt se anwald      eaðe ne meahte
text.50: his anwaldes      ðurh þa ecan meaht,
text.51: oððe him his yfeles      elles gestioran?
text.52: Eala, gif he wolde,      ðæt he wel meahte,
text.54: Eawla, þæt se hlaford      hefig gioc slepte
text.55: sware on þa swyran      sinra ðegena,
text.56: ealra ðara hæleða      þe on his tidum
text.57: geond þas lænan worold      liban sceoldon.
text.60: ðær wæs swiðe sweotol,      þæt we sædon oft,
text.61: þæt se anwald ne deð      awiht godes
text.62: gif se wel nele      þe his geweald hafað.
